text.title: Scottish Ebola nurse Pauline Cafferkey 'critically ill' says Royal Free Hospital
text.head: Scottish Ebola nurse Pauline Cafferkey 'critically ill' says Royal Free Hospital
Sources

list.item: Anthony Jospeh. "Ebola nurse Pauline Cafferkey is CRITICALLY ill as her condition deteriorates, the London isolation unit treating her has revealed" — Mail Online , October 15, 2015
Sarah Boseley. "Ebola nurse Pauline Cafferkey critically ill in deterioration that shocks experts" — The Guardian , October 14, 2015
"Ebola nurse Pauline Cafferkey now 'critically ill'" — BBC News Online , October 14, 2015
"Family of Ebola nurse Pauline Cafferkey says she was 'let down'" — BBC News Online , October 11, 2015
